author: dezzio
msg: OpenJPA-1002: fixed select range for Oracle drivers, patch submitted by Amy Yang and Ravi Palacherla

author: jfthomps
msg: VCL-95
Set Subversion properties
for all perl scripts in bin to:
executable: *
eol-style: native
keywords: Date Revision Author HeadURL Id
for all perl scripts, including modules:
eol-style: native
keywords: Date Revision Author HeadURL Id
for unix scripts:
eol-stype: native
keywords: Date Revision Author HeadURL Id
for all windows specific files (.cmd, .vbs, .inf, .bat, .txt):
eol-style: CRLF
for all windows specific scripts (.cmd, .vbs, .bat):
keywords: Date Revision Author HeadURL Id

Some windows files had a mix of EOL characters due to the apache header having been injected with unix style EOLs.  These files had to be updated to have matching EOL characters throughout before adding the eol-style property.

author: taylor
msg: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/JS2-981
Further testing, didn't uncover any errors so Im going to close this issue.
Did some refactoring to facilitate writing test cases in the next release (there aren't many test cases here(!))

The implementation was tied to Pluto's preferences api. This commit more clearly separates the Preferences persistence apis from the Plut apis, making it easier to write tests as well as use the preferences with less coupling to the portlet api

author: matzew
msg: TRINIDAD-1459 - Add support for Change Manager (customization) feature for Facelets mode
In order to support Change Manager feature in Facelets, we simply introduce a new/optional
ViewHandler, that extends the FaceletViewHandler.
Thanks to Prakash Udupa N for the patch.
